meanings.definition: A period of time spent in a particular activity or pursuit.
meanings.sent1: During the speels of painting, she created a beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent2: The speels of reading lasted all afternoon.
meanings.sent3: His speels of playing video games often made him lose track of time.
meanings.sent4: The speels of gardening felt like a peaceful escape from reality.
meanings.sent5: The speels of dancing under the stars was a magical experience.

meanings.definition: To climb or move quickly and energetically.
meanings.sent1: The cat speels up the tree to catch the bird.
meanings.sent2: She speels over the rocks with ease.
meanings.sent3: He speels up the stairs two at a time, full of energy.
meanings.sent4: The squirrel speels along the branches, agile and swift.
meanings.sent5: The athlete speels through the obstacle course, determined to win.

meanings.definition: To talk in a long-winded or rambling way.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa speels about his adventures as a young man.
meanings.sent2: She speels on and on about her favorite TV show.
meanings.sent3: The teacher speels about the history of ancient civilizations, putting everyone to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The politician speels about change but never takes action.
meanings.sent5: The tour guide speels fascinating stories about the city's past.
